book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲓ̈ⲙⲁⲕⲁⲣⲓⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲯⲓⲧ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ϯⲛⲁϫⲉ ⲡⲙⲉϩⲙⲏⲧ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁⲗⲁⲥ.
English: There be nine things which I have judged in mine heart to be happy, and the tenth I will utter with my tongue:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲉϥⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲉϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲡϩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ
English: A man that hath joy of his children; and he that liveth to see the fall of his enemy:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲥⲗⲁⲁⲧⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲣ̅ϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲏⲥ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: Well is him that dwelleth with a wife of understanding, and that hath not slipped with his tongue, and that hath not served a man more unworthy than himself:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲩⲙⲁⲁ[ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲥⲱ]ⲧⲙ̅.
English: Well is him that hath found prudence, and he that speaketh in the ears of them that will hear:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: O how great is he that findeth wisdom! yet is there none above him that feareth the Lord. (11) But the love of the Lord passeth all things for illumination: he that holdeth it, whereto shall he be likened?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ ⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛ ⲉⲛⲓⲙ;
English: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of his love: and faith is the beginning of cleaving unto him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡⲗⲏⲅⲏ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲡⲗⲏⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ.
English: Give me any plague, but the plague of the heart: and any wickedness, but the wickedness of a woman:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲙⲟⲭⲥ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲙⲟⲥⲧⲉ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ.
English: And any affliction, but the affliction from them that hate me: and any revenge, but the revenge of enemies.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲁⲡⲉ ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲁⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲫⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲉⲡⲁ ⲡϫⲁϫⲉ
English: There is no head above the head of a serpent; and there is no wrath above the wrath of an enemy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲉϣ ⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲇⲣⲁⲕⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥϭⲱⲛⲧ̅.
English: I had rather dwell with a lion and a dragon, than to keep house with a wicked woman.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ ϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲥⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲥϩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲟⲟⲩⲛⲉ.
English: The wickedness of a woman changeth her face, and darkeneth her countenance like sackcloth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣϣⲁⲛ ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲛⲟϫϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱϥ ⲛϥ̅ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ϣⲁϥⲁϣⲁϩⲟⲙ ⲉϥⲥⲁϣⲉ.
English: Her husband shall sit among his neighbours; and when he heareth it shall sigh bitterly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲕⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲥⲟⲃⲕ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲧⲕⲁⲕⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲥ̅.
English: All wickedness is but little to the wickedness of a woman: let the portion of a sinner fall upon her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲗ̅ⲗⲟ ⲉϥⲱⲗ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ... ⲛ̅ϣⲟ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥ[ⲱϣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ] ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲁϣ.
English: As the climbing up a sandy way is to the feet of the aged, so is a wife full of words to a quiet man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϩⲉ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲱⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ.
English: Stumble not at the beauty of a woman, and desire her not for pleasure.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲧⲃⲁⲗ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϯ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈.
English: A woman, if she maintain her husband, is full of anger, impudence, and much reproach.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉϥⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲏⲩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲟ ....... [ⲙⲛ̅] ⲟⲩⲡⲗⲏⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: A wicked woman abateth the courage, maketh an heavy countenance and a wounded heart:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲉⲩⲕⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲡⲁⲧ ⲉⲩⲃⲏⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲥ̅ⲙⲁⲕⲁⲣⲓⲍⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈.
English: a woman that will not comfort her husband in distress maketh weak hands and feeble knees.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲁ ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲃⲏⲧⲥ̅ ⲉⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲛ̅.
English: Of the woman came the beginning of sin, and through her we all die.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲧⲉϩⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉϥⲥⲱⲕ: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲡⲁⲣϩⲏⲥⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Give the water no passage; neither a wicked woman liberty to gad abroad.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲛⲥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲁϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲁⲛ ⲥⲟⲗⲡⲥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅.
English: If she go not as thou wouldest have her, cut her off from thy flesh, and give her a bill of divorce, and let her go.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲫⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲏⲏⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲁϩⲉ ⲕⲏⲃ.
English: Blessed is the man that hath a virtuous wife, for the number of his days shall be double.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲥϫⲉⲕ ⲛⲉϥⲣⲟⲙⲡⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ.
English: A virtuous woman rejoiceth her husband, and he shall fulfil the years of his life in peace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ: ⲉⲩⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲉⲣⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: A good wife is a good portion, which shall be given in the portion of them that fear the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲉⲟⲩⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲩ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲟ ⲣⲟⲟⲩⲧ.
English: Whether a man be rich or poor, if he have a good heart toward the Lord, he shall at all times rejoice with a cheerful countenance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲁϩⲏⲧ ⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲧ ϩⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲓⲟⲩⲱⲗⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϩⲟ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲉϩϥⲧⲟⲟⲩ: ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲗⲁ: ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲙⲟⲩ.
English: There be three things that mine heart feareth; and for the fourth I was sore afraid: the slander of a city, the gathering together of an unruly multitude, and a false accusation: all these are worse than death.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙ̅ⲕⲁϩ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲃⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥⲕⲱϩ ⲉⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲙⲁⲥⲧⲓⲅⲝ̅ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲥ ⲧⲉ ⲉⲥⲕⲟⲓⲛⲱⲛⲓ ⲉⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: But a grief of heart and sorrow is a woman that is jealous over another woman, and a scourge of the tongue which communicateth with all.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛⲁϩⲃ̅ ⲉϥⲕⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲟⲩ: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟϩⲉ.
English: An evil wife is a yoke shaken to and fro: he that hath hold of her is as though he held a scorpion.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥϯϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥϩⲱⲃⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: A drunken woman and a gadder abroad causeth great anger, and she will not cover her own shame.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲡⲟⲣⲛⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ⲃⲁⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛⲥ̅ ϩⲓ ⲛⲉⲥⲃⲟⲩϩⲉ.
English: The whoredom of a woman may be known in her haughty looks and eyelids.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲉⲩϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉⲥϩⲉ ⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲣ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲟⲩⲁϣϥ̅.
English: If thy daughter be shameless, keep her in straitly, lest she abuse herself through overmuch liberty.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲟⲩⲁ .... ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ..... ⲉⲥϣⲁⲛⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ.
English: Watch over an impudent eye: and marvel not if she trespass against thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲣⲱϥ ⲟⲩⲏⲛ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲏ ⲉϣⲁϥⲥⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧϩⲏⲛ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲉⲓⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲁ ⲛ̅............
English: She will open her mouth, as a thirsty traveller when he hath found a fountain, and drink of every water near her: by every hedge will she sit down, and open her quiver against every arrow.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ .... ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲥⲥⲃⲱ ϯ ⲕⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲕⲁⲁⲥ.
English: The grace of a wife delighteth her husband, and her discretion will fatten his bones.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϯ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲣⲕϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϣⲃ̅ⲉⲓⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲧⲥⲁⲃⲏⲩ.
English: A silent and loving woman is a gift of the Lord; and there is nothing so much worth as a mind well instructed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲡⲓⲉⲉⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϣⲓ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ.
English: A shamefaced and faithful woman is a double grace, and her continent mind cannot be valued.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲏ ⲉⲧϣⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲓ̈ⲥ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲥⲁⲛⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲏⲓ̈.
English: As the sun when it ariseth in the high heaven; so is the beauty of a good wife in the ordering of her house.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲏⲃⲥ̅ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲩϩ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲩⲭⲛⲓⲁ ⲉⲥⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲟ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲟⲧ ⲉⲥⲧⲏϣ.
English: As the clear light is upon the holy candlestick; so is the beauty of the face in ripe age.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲧⲩⲗⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲃⲁⲥⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲧ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ..... ⲛ̅ⲁⲧϣⲧⲟⲣⲧⲣ̅.
English: As the golden pillars are upon the sockets of silver; so are the fair feet with a constant heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ... ϩⲛ̅ ........ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲉⲓ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲙ̅ϩϣⲟⲙⲛ̅ⲧ:
English: There be two things that grieve my heart; and the third maketh me angry:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲉϥϣⲁⲁⲧ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉϭⲣⲱϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩϣⲁⲛ........
English: a man of war that suffereth poverty; and men of understanding that are not set by;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: and one that returneth from righteousness to sin; the Lord prepareth such an one for the sword.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲟⲅⲓⲥ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲉϣⲱⲧ ⲣ̅ⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲕⲁⲡⲏⲗⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: A merchant shall hardly keep himself from doing wrong; and an huckster shall not be freed from sin.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϣⲃ̅ϣⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ϫⲡⲉ ϩⲁϩ ⲛⲁⲕⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ.
English: Many have sinned for a small matter; and he that seeketh for abundance will turn his eyes away.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩⲟⲩⲉϣⲧⲱⲕⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲟⲩⲧⲁⲡ ⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲛⲉ: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϩⲱⲱϥ ⲉⲓ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϯ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓ ϣⲱⲡ.
English: As a nail sticketh fast between the joinings of the stones; so doth sin stick close between buying and selling.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϣⲁⲛⲧⲙ̅ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲡⲉϥⲏⲓ̈ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩⲛⲟⲩ.
English: Unless a man hold himself diligently in the fear of the Lord, his house shall soon be overthrown.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲧⲛ̅ ϣⲱϫⲡ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲟⲗϣⲗ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲗϥ̅ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: As when one sifteth with a sieve, the refuse remaineth; so the filth of man in his talk.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉϩⲣⲱ ⲧⲉ ϣⲁⲥⲇⲟⲕⲓⲙⲁⲍⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲕⲉⲩⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲩⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲡⲓⲣⲁⲥⲙⲟⲥ .....
English: The furnace proveth the potter’s vessels; so the trial of man is in his reasoning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡ......ⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ...... ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲫⲏⲧ ....
English: The fruit declareth if the tree have been dressed; so is the utterance of a conceit in the heart of man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ ........ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ......
English: Praise no man before thou hearest him speak; for this is the trial of men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ....... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁⲧⲁⲁϥ ϩⲓⲱⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧϣⲛ̅ⲧⲱ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: If thou followest righteousness, thou shalt obtain her, and put her on, as a glorious long robe.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲗⲁⲧⲉ ⲟⲩⲱϩ ϩⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϯⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲙⲉ ⲕⲟⲧⲥ̅ ⲉⲛ ⲉⲧⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ
English: The birds will resort unto their like; so will truth return unto them that practise in her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈ ϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ⲉⲩⲡⲁϩⲥ̅: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ⲉⲛⲉϯⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: As the lion lieth in wait for the prey; so sin for them that work iniquity.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲡⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϣⲁϥϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟϩ
English: The discourse of a godly man is always with wisdom; but a fool changeth as the moon.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲓ ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲧⲁϣⲟⲕ ⲇⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: If thou be among the indiscreet, observe the time; but be continually among men of understanding.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲩⲥⲱⲃⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲡⲁⲧⲁⲗⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: The discourse of fools is irksome, and their sport is the wantonness of sin.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧϭⲓⲛϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲱⲣⲕ̅ .... ⲉⲡⲉⲕϣⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩϩⲱϫⲡ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲓϣⲉ
English: The talk of him that sweareth much maketh the hair stand upright; and their brawls make one stop his ears.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲡⲉϩⲧ̅ ⲥⲛⲟϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲙⲓϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲩⲥⲁϩⲟⲩ.
English: The strife of the proud is bloodshedding, and their revilings are grievous to the ear.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϭⲱⲗⲡ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲩⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥ[ϩⲉ] ⲛ̅ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: Whoso discovereth secrets loseth his credit; and shall never find friend to his mind.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧⲕ̅ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ϭⲱⲗⲡ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲙⲩⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ.
English: Love thy friend, and be faithful unto him: but if thou betrayest his secrets, follow no more after him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϫⲁϫⲉ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ.
English: For as a man hath destroyed his enemy; so hast thou lost the love of thy neighbour.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ ⲉⲁⲕⲕⲁⲁϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲕⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲕϣⲧⲁϩⲟϥ.
English: As one that letteth a bird go out of his hand, so hast thou let thy neighbour go, and shalt not get him again

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ϫⲉ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲡⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭϩⲟⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲁϣ.
English: Follow after him no more, for he is too far off; he is as a roe escaped out of the snare.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲣ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲁϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲧⲡ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲓϣⲉ: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϭⲱⲗⲡ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲩⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ........
English: As for a wound, it may be bound up; and after reviling there may be reconcilement: but he that betrayeth secrets is without hope.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: He that winketh with the eyes worketh evil: and he that knoweth him will depart from him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ..... ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲥ ...... ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ....
English: When thou art present, he will speak sweetly, and will admire thy words: but at the last he will writhe his mouth, and slander thy sayings.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲓ̈ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ϩⲁϩ .....
English: I have hated many things, but nothing like him; for the Lord will hate him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲉϫ ⲟⲩⲱⲛⲉ ...... ⲉϫⲱϥ: ⲟⲩⲡⲗⲏⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲕⲣⲟϥ ϣⲁⲥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲡⲱⲗϩ̅.
English: Whoso casteth a stone on high casteth it on his own head; and a deceitful stroke shall make wounds.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϣⲓⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲓⲉⲓⲧ ϥⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁϩⲟ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲁϣ ϥⲛⲁϩⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: Whoso diggeth a pit shall fall therein: and he that setteth a trap shall be taken therein.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉϯⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲩⲛⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲉⲓⲙⲉ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲉⲓ ⲛⲁϥ ⲧⲱⲛ.
English: He that worketh mischief, it shall fall upon him, and he shall not know whence it cometh.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲥⲱϣϥ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭⲛⲉϭ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ⲛⲁϭⲱⲣϭ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈.
English: Mockery and reproach are from the proud; but vengeance, as a lion, shall lie in wait for them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲧⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲁϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲙⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲙⲟⲩ.
English: They that rejoice at the fall of the righteous shall be taken in the snare; and anguish shall consume them before they die.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ϥⲟⲧⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅ ⲉϥⲙⲏⲛ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲣⲅⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Malice and wrath, even these are abominations; and the sinful man shall have them both.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: He that revengeth shall find vengeance from the Lord, and he will surely keep his sins in remembrance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Forgive thy neighbour the hurt that he hath done unto thee, so shall thy sins also be forgiven when thou prayest.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ............. ⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅ ⲉⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ .... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ϣⲓⲛⲉ ..... ⲕⲱ ⲛⲁϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: One man beareth hatred against another, and doth he seek pardon from the Lord?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲙⲡϥ̅ⲛⲁ ⲣⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ϩⲁ ⲛⲉϥⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: He sheweth no mercy to a man, which is like himself: and doth he ask forgiveness of his own sins?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲉⲩⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲡⲉ ⲉϥⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲕⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲛⲟⲃⲉ;
English: If he that is but flesh nourish hatred, who will intreat for pardon of his sins?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϩⲁⲏ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲗⲟ ⲉⲕⲟ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: Remember thy end, and let enmity cease; remember corruption and death, and abide in the commandments.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲧϩⲓⲧⲟⲩⲱⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲇⲓⲁⲑⲏⲕⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲟⲃϣⲥ̅.
English: Remember the commandments, and bear no malice to thy neighbour: remember the covenant of the Highest, and wink at ignorance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲁϩⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲓϣⲉ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲧⲙ̅ϩⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲓϣⲉ.
English: Abstain from strife, and thou shalt diminish thy sins: for a furious man will kindle strife,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϣⲧⲣⲧⲣ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲃⲉⲉⲣ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲛⲟⲩϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲇⲓⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ....
English: A sinful man disquieteth friends, and maketh debate among them that be at peace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: As the matter of the fire is, so it burneth: and as a man’s strength is, so is his wrath;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: and according to his riches his anger riseth; and the stronger they are which contend, the more they will be inflamed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: An hasty contention kindleth a fire: and an hasty fighting sheddeth blood.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛ ⲛⲓϥⲉ ⲉⲟⲩϯⲕ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲙⲟⲩϩ: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛⲛⲉϫ ⲡⲁϭⲥⲉ ⲉϫⲱϥ ϥⲛⲁϫⲛⲉ: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲩⲛⲛⲏⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ.
English: If thou blow the spark, it shall burn: if thou spit upon it, it shall be quenched: and both these come out of thy mouth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣϣⲉ ⲉⲥϩⲟⲩⲣ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲕⲁⲥⲕⲥ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ: ⲁϥⲧⲁⲕⲉ ϩⲁϩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ.
English: Curse the whisperer and doubletongued: for such have destroyed many that were at peace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲟⲕϫⲕ̅ ⲕⲓⲙ ⲉⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲡⲟⲟⲛⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲉϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ϣⲟⲣϣⲣ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲉⲩⲟⲣϫ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁⲩⲟ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲏⲓ̈.
English: A backbiting tongue hath disquieted many, and driven them from nation to nation: strong cities hath it pulled down, and overthrown the houses of great men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲟⲕϫⲕ̅ ⲁϥⲛⲉϫ ϩⲛ̅ϩⲓⲟⲙⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϫⲱⲱⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϩⲟⲩⲣⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩϩⲓⲥⲉ.
English: A backbiting tongue hath cast out virtuous women, and deprived them of their labours.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲉ ⲉⲙⲧⲟⲛ ⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϭⲣⲁϩⲧ̅.
English: Whoso hearkeneth unto it shall never find rest, and never dwell quietly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: The stroke of the whip maketh marks in the flesh: but the stroke of the tongue breaketh the bones.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
English: Many have fallen by the edge of the sword: but not so many as have fallen by the tongue.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ...... ϥⲃⲱⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲥⲱⲕ ϩⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁϩⲃⲉϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲙⲟⲣϥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ
English: Well is he that is defended through the venom thereof; who hath not drawn the yoke thereof, nor hath been bound in her bands.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁϩⲃⲉϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲟⲩⲛⲁϩⲃⲉϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲓⲡⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ϩⲉⲛⲙⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲙⲧ ⲛⲉ.
English: For the yoke thereof is a yoke of iron, and the bands thereof are bands of brass.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲩ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: The death thereof is an evil death, the grave were better than it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲛⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲣⲟⲭⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϩ.
English: It shall not have rule over them that fear God, neither shall they be burned with the flame thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲉⲓ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲧⲙ̅ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲧⲙ̅ⲱϣⲙ̅.
English: Such as forsake the Lord shall fall into it; and it shall burn in them, and not be quenched;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲉⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲟⲩϥ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥⲉⲧⲁⲕⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲁⲣⲇⲁⲗⲓⲥ.
English: it shall be sent upon them as a lion, and devour them as a leopard.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲛⲅ̅ϫⲗ̅ϫⲗ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϭⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲛⲧⲉ ⲙⲣ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲁⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲛⲟⲩⲃ.
English: Look that thou hedge thy possession about with thorns, and bind up thy silver and gold,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲁϣⲑⲁⲙ ⲛⲙ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲟ ....
English: And weigh thy words in a balance, and make a door and bar for thy mouth.
